entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
